reviews.review: Ten system VAC jest tak barzo słaby że dał za nic bana. Jak chciałbym skontaktować się z supportem to oczywiście piszą że nie mogą mi w tej sprawie pomóc, ponieważ blokady są nakładane przez bota czy coś i nie mogą już tego usunąć. Szczerze już nie zagram w cs'a dopóki nie zrobią nowego anti-cheata.

The game was good back in 2002 when I first played it. it is even better today in 2020. And AK-47 is still the most efficient weapon.
Warning: if you play this game and get addicted to climbing the ranks, it can consume your life. Very fun game, very addicting. Highly recommend.

GO and the 1.6 are the best FPS games ever made.

Now that its free sure go ahead play it (dont play if you're gonna use hacks please ty) but to be honest aim at their weenie it should grant you a headshot you can also aim at their head if you're feeling lucky

Good game but I would be very happy if they added bots back because if theres no bots competitive games are boring and just dry in my opinion.This game need a graphical update.The graphics are just basic and doesnt stand out to the modern games.Maps are plain and kinda ugly with these old graphics and need a rework.I know this is a competitive game and this game takes skill not your opinions on graphics but I still would be happy if they step up they're game.But overall this game is great to the certain point.This game will take your free time from your life and you will regret it.
CS:GO. Play with your own risk XD XD XD
